name: reviews
intro:
Welcome to DigBury, where I teach you twerps how to think!



Where there's exciting, important creativity, I'm DIGGIN it!

Where there's shallow, inane mediocrity, I'm BURYIN it!

reviews.title: Magic: The Gathering
reviews.blurb: Collecting and battling with 'cardboard crack' reigns supreme.

reviews.title: Nier: Automata
reviews.sub: This game makes the player confront what it is 2B or not 2B.
reviews.blurb: This game makes the player confront what it is 2B or not 2B.

reviews.title: Midsommar
reviews.blurb: Men and women, young and old, this one is beautifully hard to bear.
